If it’s ‘so easy,’ then why haven’t I figured it out? Could you just tell me more or less what I should look for at least?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 05:01:15 PM[/size][hr]please help… :([br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 05:17:56 PM[/size][hr]help me please :[

dell… im begging youu…

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @zamathiar zamathiar
item.description:
@zamathiar wrote:

Just would like to say that when you post on a re:help topic don’t get smart and explain what you mean.

Ty

~Owner Soulx~ of Soul VX PK

BTW: You can either go back and delete all you got from tutorial or…IF you made a back-up of your source then delete the one u messed up on and continue on your back-up…

NOTICE: Bammer tutorial causes many errors plz think before you use
